gnutellaClient

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • gnutellaClient.Server
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Class that represents the Server part of Gnutella Servent
    Author:
    Ismael Fernandez, Miguel Alonso Vilchis

    • Constructor Detail

      • Server

        public Server(int myPort,
      java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap<java.net.InetSocketAddress,ServentThread> neighbors,
      java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap<java.lang.String,java.net.InetSocketAddress> historyPing,
      java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap<java.lang.String,java.net.InetSocketAddress> historyQuery,
      java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentLinkedQueue<Message> pendingMessages,
      IdGenerator myIdGenerator,
      java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap<java.net.InetSocketAddress,ServentThread> downloads,
      java.io.File myDirectory)
       throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a Server that listen for upcoming connections on the specified port.
        Parameters:
        myPort - Port in which the server will wait for upcoming connections
        neighbors - HashMap that contains the connections to its neighbors nodes. Keys are in format InetSocketAddress, those InetSocketAddress are bound with each connection(ServentThread).
        historyPing - HashMap that contains de history of every PingMessage received from a neighbor Servent and every PingMessage generated by the Servent that owns this Server
        historyQuery - HashMap that contains de history of every QueryMessage received from a neighbor Servent and every QueryMessage generated by the Servent that owns this Server
        pendingMessages - Queue which contains every message that needs to be process by the Servent that owns this Server
        myIdGenerator - Object to generate id
        downloads - HashMap that contains the connections to nodes which the Servent owner of this Server has request for downloads and connections to nodes that request for a download . Keys are in format InetSocketAddress, those InetSocketAddress are bound with each connection(ServentThread). Values are ServentThread.
        myDirectory - DirectoryPath or file which, the Servent that owns this Server, shares with the network
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - IO error when opening the socket in which this Server listens for upcoming connections
